name: Double Chocolate Mocha Trifle
author: ADRSEW
summary: This is a great party dessert for the chocolate lover in all of us.  Optional: decorate top with canned whipped topping swirl and shaved chocolate curls. Make sure you get a little of each layer in every serving. Enjoy!
ingredients: 2 (3.3 ounce) packages instant white chocolate pudding mix
3 (1.4 ounce) bars chocolate covered toffee bars, chopped
directions: Prepare brownies according to package directions
In a medium bowl, whisk together milk and pudding mix until mixture begins to thicken
Dissolve coffee granules in water and stir into pudding mixture
In a glass serving bowl, layer one-third of brownie cubes, one-third of pudding mixture and one-third of candy
Repeat layering until all ingredients are used
Chill 30 minutes in refrigerator before serving
